name: Curse of the Blue Bunny
description:
Curse of the Blue Bunny is a platformer for Centennial College's Fall 2021 Game Jam that lasted 5 days.

The developers and their roles are as follows:

Brett Formosa - Programmer, Sound Design

Ben Ahumu-Kuni - Environmental Artist

Hongsheng Li - UI Artist, Enemy Design

Ronan Daniel - Character Artist, Narrative

Kurtis Kennedy - Programmer, Level Designer
